item.title: Cryptoverse：以太币受制于现货 ETF 提议的命运
item.description: 加密货币以太坊正努力追赶飙升的老大哥比特币。【原文：Cryptocurrency ether is struggling to keep pace with soaring big brother bitcoin.】

item.title: 印度 3 月份工厂增长创 16 年新高，招聘人数回升
item.description: 一项调查显示，由于需求加速，印度制造业在 3 月份实现了稳健增长，增速为 16 年来最快。【原文：India's manufacturing industry enjoyed solid growth in March, expanding at the fastest pace in 16 years thanks to accelerating demand, according to a survey that also showed hiring increased at the strongest rate in six months.】

item.title: 边疆航空公司大修网络，转而提供高级座位以求东山再起
item.description: 美国廉价航空公司边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司正集中精力发展西雅图和底特律等 "高票价 "市场的网络，而牺牲了在拉斯维加斯和佛罗里达等休闲市场的业务，以期提高收益。【原文：U.S. no-frills carrier Frontier Airlines is focusing on growing its network in "high fare" markets like Seattle and Detroit at the expense of its footprint in leisure markets such as Las Vegas and Florida in a bid to lift earnings, its CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 政府称泰国前三个月游客人数达 940 万，消费额达 124 亿美元
item.description: 泰国旅游部周二表示，今年前三个月，泰国共接待了 940 万名外国游客，估计这些游客为泰国经济带来了 4,546 亿泰铢（约合 124 亿美元）的消费。【原文：Thailand recorded 9.4 million foreign tourists in the first three months of this year, who contributed an estimated 454.6 billion baht ($12.4 billion) to the economy in spending, the tourism ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价日元警戒令市场保持紧张
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商江淮汽车前负责人因腐败问题接受调查
item.description: 中国反贪局称，江淮汽车集团（JAC）原党委书记、董事长安进因涉嫌腐败正在接受调查。【原文：The former party secretary and chairman of Jianghuai Automobile Group (JAC) , An Jin, is under investigation for corruption, China's anti-graft watchdog said.】

item.title: 迪士尼在与激进投资者的董事会席位争夺战中遥遥领先
item.description: 在争夺董事会席位和全球娱乐集团未来的战斗中，华特-迪士尼似乎领先于激进投资者，在周三的公司年度会议前，超过半数的股份都进行了投票。【原文：Walt Disney appeared to pull ahead of activist investors in the battle for board seats and the future of the global entertainment conglomerate, with more than half of all shares voted before the company's annual meeting on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，美元坚挺，降息预期减弱
item.description: 由于美联储接近降息的预期减弱，周二亚洲股市上涨，美元走强，使日元汇率保持在152美元兑1美元的水平附近，令交易商担心可能出现干预。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Tuesday and the dollar firmed, keeping the yen pinned near the 152-per-dollar levels that has traders worried about possible intervention, as expectations that the Federal Reserve was close to cutting interest rates faded.】

item.title: 收益令人失望，派息减少，中国万科股价暴跌
item.description: 在香港上市的国有开发商中国万科周二早盘股价下滑达 11.1%，该公司上周末报告 2023 年核心利润下降 50.6%，且不派息。【原文：Hong Kong-listed shares of state-backed developer China Vanke slid as much as 11.1% in early trading on Tuesday after it reported a 50.6% drop in 2023 core profit and no dividend payout late last week.】

item.title: 小米推出电动汽车后股价大涨 16
item.description: 智能手机和其他消费电子产品制造商小米上周推出了一款运动型电动汽车，其设计被比作保时捷的 Taycan 和 Panamera 跑车。【原文：Shares of China's Xiaomi surged as much as 16% on Tuesday after the maker of smartphones and other consumer electronics last week launched a sporty electric vehicle whose design has been likened to Porsche's Taycan and Panamera sports car models.】

item.title: 美联储减息押注减弱，美元走强，忌惮情绪推升日元
item.description: 周二，美元兑主要货币徘徊在4个半月高点附近，交易商急于推低对美联储今年首次降息的押注。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered near a 4-1/2-month high against major peers on Tuesday as traders rushed to push back bets for the Federal Reserve's first interest rate cut this year.】

item.title: 制造业数据向好，中东紧张局势升级，石油上涨
item.description: 周二，油价在亚洲早盘交易中上涨，受需求改善迹象和中东紧张局势升级的支撑，美国期油在上一交易日一度涨至五个月高点。【原文：Oil prices gained in early Asian trading on Tuesday, underpinned by signs of improved demand and escalating Middle East tensions that had sparked a rally in U.S. futures to a five-month high in the previous session.】

item.title: 中国石油巨头面临适应电动汽车未来的艰难挑战
item.description: 在北京郊区的一条小路上，中国石化于 2023 年 12 月启用的小武基电池充电站让人们看到了中国后汽油时代的未来。【原文：Tucked away on a side road in suburban Beijing, the Xiaowuji battery charging station opened by Sinopec in December 2023 offers a glimpse of China's post-gasoline future.】

item.title: 为推动扩张，家得宝今年将在墨西哥斥资 1.72 亿美元
item.description: 家得宝家居装饰连锁店周一表示，将于 2024 年在墨西哥投资 28.6 亿比索（1.7216 亿美元），以扩大其在墨西哥的市场份额。【原文：Home Depot will invest 2.86 billion pesos ($172.16 million) in Mexico in 2024 in a bid to expand its market share in the country, the home improvement chain said on Monday.】

item.title: 加州民主党人敦促拜登不要取消芯片研发资金
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）和参议员亚历克斯-帕迪利亚（Alex Padilla）均为民主党人，他们于周一敦促拜登政府撤销取消对建设和扩建半导体研发设施的补贴计划的决定。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom and Senator Alex Padilla, both Democrats, urged the Biden administration on Monday to reverse its decision to cancel a subsidy program for building and expanding semiconductor research and development facilities.】

item.title: 标普全球将摩根大通的评级展望调整为 "正面
item.description: S&P Global周一将摩根大通的评级展望从 "稳定 "调整为 "积极"，理由是其庞大的贷款交易业务表现强于同行。【原文：S&P Global on Monday revised the rating outlook of JPMorgan Chase to 'positive' from 'stable', citing the strength of its sprawling lending-to-trading business that has outperformed peers.】

item.title: 早间竞标向强大的美元致敬
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: T.Rowe Price支持迪士尼董事与对冲基金展开董事会挑战
item.description: 持有约 930 万股华特迪士尼股票的共同基金公司 T. Rowe Price 表示，它已投票支持这家娱乐业巨头的董事，这对寻求董事会席位的激进对冲基金特里亚基金管理公司（Trian Fund Management）和布莱克韦尔斯资本公司（Blackwells Capital）造成了打击。【原文：Mutual fund firm T. Rowe Price , which owned roughly 9.3 million shares in Walt Disney , said it has voted for the entertainment giant's directors, dealing a blow to activist hedge funds Trian Fund Management and Blackwells Capital as they seek board seats.】

item.title: Canoo 公司对其持续经营的能力表示怀疑
item.description: Canoo Inc 周一表示，其持续经营能力存在重大疑问。【原文：Canoo Inc said on Monday there was substantial doubt about its ability to continue as a going concern.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟称两名独立董事在司法部调查后辞职
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周一表示，独立董事史蒂文-米隆（Steven Miron）和史蒂文-纽豪斯（Steven Newhouse）已辞去媒体公司董事会的职务，立即生效。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Monday that independent directors Steven Miron and Steven Newhouse have resigned from the media company's board, effective immediately.】

item.title: Citadel 的格里芬预计美国经济形势充满挑战，但对固定收益更为有利
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，Citadel 对冲基金亿万富翁肯尼斯-格里芬（Kenneth Griffin）告诉投资者，他预计中期经济形势仍将充满挑战，但随着通胀缓解，对美国固定收益市场更为有利。【原文：Citadel's hedge fund billionaire Kenneth Griffin told investors he expects the medium-term economic landscape will remain challenging, but more favorable for fixed-income markets in the U.S., as inflation eases, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 纽约州法院驳回作者要求阻止《纽约时报》等起诉 OpenAI 案件的申请
item.description: 周一，一群作家在加利福尼亚州起诉 OpenAI 侵犯版权，但未能说服纽约联邦法院停止审理《纽约时报》、作家协会和其他组织在曼哈顿提起的相关案件。【原文：A group of authors suing OpenAI for copyright infringement in California failed to convince a New York federal court on Monday to halt related cases brought in Manhattan by the New York Times, the Authors Guild and others.】

item.title: 纽约联储通胀指数显示 2 月份物价上涨压力减弱
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一表示，2 月份基本通胀压力减弱。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday that underlying inflation pressures weakened in February.】

item.title: OpenAI 无需注册即可访问 ChatGPT
item.description: 由微软支持的初创公司OpenAI周一表示，从下周一开始，用户无需注册即可使用其免费使用的ChatGPT生成式人工智能聊天机器人。【原文：OpenAI will start allowing users to access its free-to-use ChatGPT generative AI chatbot without needing to sign up for the service beginning Monday, the Microsoft -backed startup said on Monday.】

item.title: 惠誉称：UnitedHealth 部门遭黑客攻击不会对非营利性医院造成信用影响
item.description: 惠誉评级机构周一表示，UnitedHealth 的技术部门 Change Healthcare 遭到网络攻击，导致全美药房服务中断，惠誉预计这不会对美国非营利性医院造成任何信用影响。【原文：Fitch does not anticipate any credit impact on not-for-profit hospitals in the United States from the cyberattack at UnitedHealth's tech unit Change Healthcare that caused disruption to pharmacies across the U.S., the ratings agency said on Monday.】

item.title: 谷歌将销毁浏览数据以解决消费者隐私诉讼
item.description: 谷歌同意销毁数十亿条数据记录，以了结一项诉讼，该诉讼称谷歌秘密跟踪了一些人的互联网使用情况，而这些人却认为自己是在私下浏览。【原文：Google agreed to destroy billions of data records to settle a lawsuit claiming it secretly tracked the internet use of people who thought they were browsing privately.】

item.title: 花旗银行将在纽约裁员 363 人
item.description: 花旗集团周一表示，其主要银行部门花旗银行将在纽约裁员 363 人。【原文：Citigroup said on Monday its primary banking unit Citibank will lay off 363 employees in New York.】

item.title: OpenAI 取消山姆-奥特曼对其创业基金的所有权
item.description: 根据向美国证券交易委员会（SEC）提交的一份文件，OpenAI 改变了其支持人工智能初创企业的风险投资基金的治理结构，因此其知名首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）不再拥有或控制该基金。【原文：OpenAI has changed the governance structure of its venture capital fund that backs AI startups, so its high profile chief executive Sam Altman no longer owns or controls the fund, according to a filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).】

item.title: Teva 和 Viatris 赢得挑战 J&J 精神分裂症药物专利的新机会
item.description: Teva Pharmaceutical 和 Viatris 周一说服了美国一家上诉法院，重新启动了对强生精神分裂症特效药专利的挑战，为它们推出更廉价的仿制药扫清了道路。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical and Viatris convinced a U.S. appeals court on Monday to revive their challenges to a patent covering a blockbuster Johnson & Johnson schizophrenia drug, giving them a new chance to clear a path to launch cheaper generic versions of the medicine.】

item.title: 美国股票基金连续第五周资金流入
item.description: 截至 3 月 27 日的七天内，美国投资者连续第五周净买入股票型基金，原因是他们维持了对今年三次降息的预期，尽管在通胀报告公布前的谨慎态度限制了购买量。【原文：U.S. investors were net buyers of equity funds for a fifth successive week in the seven days to March 27 as they maintained expectations of three interest rate cuts this year, although caution ahead of an inflation report capped purchases.】
